page.title: 01TITLE PAGE
page.content: Our block is 4 by 3 kilometres. There are few trees in our block. It is nearly always cold and windy because it is a coastal town. There are no fetes in winter and few in summer. There are 6 schools in our block which are Clavering, St.John Vianney, Barnard Grove, West View and Henry Smiths.Our block is a residential area. We have a small industry which consists of G.E.C. Telecommunications, Reeds corrugated cases,Steetly Magnasite and Decoflex. Unemployment is high in our town. There are 5 farms in our block. We do not suffer from smoke or pollution. There are about 6 pubs in our block. There is only 1 Hospital in our block which is called the General. Our beach is not very clean. Near the beach there is a golf course it is the only golf course in our block.
